topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552f360f63687216b21f0e00#post_552f360f63687216b21f0e00
Well there is a big one in Dead Space 3. It involves EA being fucking morons who piss on a perfectly good franchise in a desperate bid to appeal to people who don't give a shit in any case by crowbaring in fucking co-op and microtransactions where they don't fucking belong because EA is run by semi-literate chuckle fucks who regularly shit themselves because they can't tell their asses from a fucking hole in the goddamn ground.

There's a chance I may be a touch bitter.
